item.description:
Join P-Collective member Abe at Yankee Spirits (70 wines)!!!!

Yankee Spirits in Attleboro is having another of their great Wine Tastings.
They are calling this one a "Mini" wine tasting, but with 70 wines to sample, there will be plenty to sample and something for everyone.

Yankee Spirits Wine Tasting (70 Wines!)
Thursday, April 26, 2012
5:00 PM
Yankee Spirits
628 Washington Street (Rt.1)
Attleboro, MA 02703

Location and reviews of Yankee Spirits in Attleboro: http://www.yelp.com/biz/yankee-spirits-attleboro

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Abe is hosting this one, please look at his picture!!!
item.name: Wine Tasting at Yankee Spirits in Attleboro MA (70 wines)!!!!
